projectGridLines.title: Internship Opportunity: AI Software Development Intern
projectGridLines.description:
Internship Opportunity: AI Software Development Intern

Location: BITS-WILP Lab (Flexible)

Duration: 5 months 10 days (08-Jan-2025 to 18-June-2025)

Stipend: $500 to $1000 per month (depending on experience)

Eligibility: Undergraduate/Postgraduate students in Computer Science, Data Science, or

related fields


Role Overview:

As an AI Software Development Intern, you will play a key role in enhancing Spanda’s opensource

AI platform. This hands-on role provides a unique opportunity to collaborate with industry

experts and customers across diverse sectors.

Key Responsibilities:

? Contribute to the design, development, and deployment of Spanda’s AI platform.

? Work on real-world customer projects in industries like sports, healthcare, oil and gas,

and education.

? Develop, fine-tune, train and test AI models tailored to specific verticals.

? Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand customer needs and deliver

optimized solutions.

? Assist in the integration of machine learning algorithms into scalable software systems.

? Conduct data analysis, preprocessing, and visualization for industry-specific use cases.

? Document the work products, findings, model performance and other relevant details

Skills & Qualifications:

? Currently enrolled in a Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in Computer Science or Circuit

Branch Major

? Completion of courses in:

? Machine Learning (ML)

? Object-Oriented Programming (OOP)

? Data Structures and Algorithms (DSA) Intelligence, Data Science, or related

fields.

? Basic knowledge of Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or other machine learning

frameworks.

? Front end and UI/UX skills if applicable

? Familiarity with DevOps practices, including continuous integration and deployment

? Familiarity with data preprocessing, model training, and deployment pipelines.

? Interpretability - knowledge of techniques for explaining and interpreting AI model

decisions

? Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to work on diverse datasets.

? Excellent communication skills and the ability to collaborate effectively in a team.

? Passion for applying AI to solve real-world challenges in industries like sports,

healthcare, and beyond.

Good to Have:

? Experience with NLP and Generative AI

? Topics: Transformer models, text similarity, embeddings, fine-tuning

language models

? Familiarity with Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG)

? Topics: Vector databases, document retrieval, hybrid search

? Frontend Development Skills

? Experience with React.js, Next.js, Node.js, UI/UX principles

? Familiarity with cloud computing platforms

? Experience with AWS, Azure, Google Cloud

? Containerization and Deployment

? Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes

? Data Science Background

? Basic understanding of data analysis, statistics, and data visualization (e.g.,

Pandas, NumPy, Matplotlib)

What You’ll Gain:

? For students who may not yet have experience with Large Language Models (LLMs),

Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), or advanced AI/ML concepts, don’t worry—

training will be provided from our side.

? Work with other BITS alumnus that embarked on the same journey last year.

? Hands-on experience in developing a cutting-edge commercial AI platform.

? Exposure to customer projects in various industries, from sports analytics to

healthcare AI.

? Mentorship from experienced AI professionals and industry leaders.

? Certificate of Completion and a potential Letter of Recommendation based on

performance.

? Networking opportunities with professionals across verticals.

? Potential to work at our global offices in the US and India if travel and foreign

assignments interest you. We are also looking to expand into Europe, Middle East and

Africa in 2025.

Interview and Travel Requirements:

? Interview: Selected candidates will participate in an interview to evaluate their technical

expertise, problem-solving skills, and ability to thrive in a team setting. This step ensures

alignment with our project goals and determines if the candidate meets our

requirements.

? Travel and Accommodation: Candidates will be responsible for arranging their own

accommodation and travel for the internship.
